c1242133-1557-402f-9ca9-07c5f9dfefb0.name: Datastore Total Disk Space Used for Cluster
c1242133-1557-402f-9ca9-07c5f9dfefb0.formula: sum(${adaptertype=VMWARE, objecttype=Datastore, metric=diskspace|disktotal, depth=3, where=(${metric=config|name} contains 'vcf-ops' )})
c1242133-1557-402f-9ca9-07c5f9dfefb0.description: Datastore Total Disk Space Used for Cluster
